feed.title: Keeping Up with the COVID-19 Epidemic
feed.subtitle: Welcome to joelhay.com. I am a PhD Health Economist whose mission is to generate and share reliable and transparent evidence on the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic, and to critically examine the institutional policies made in response to the epidemic around the globe.

entry.title: Washington Times article on public policy panic

link.title: Washington Times article on public policy panic

entry.content: The Washington Times: Public policy panic about the COVID-19 pandemic not supported by the facts. Click for article
